column1: You have to be more cautious.
The light emitted from the stars might confuse you
just like that certain moon lady.
So it's you!? How dare you take away people's lives!
Sorry, but I do not understand what you are saying.
I would never do that sort of thing, you know?
Calm down, Reimu! Perhaps we made a mistake?
I am a God that can realize dreams,
but I only respond to the sincerest prayer.
Every star in the sky has its own soul.
To accumulate power and realize dreams using stars, one must use his or her own soul as a price.
This is the way to balance the cosmic law of energy.
So are you using people's souls?
At the cost of one's soul to realize dreams, the burden falls to the one who prayed
because that soul would be the most pure.
Her soul has no indication of flaw; it is as pure as snow.
I see that after so many years, humans still have not changed.
Reimu, that was a scary laugh.
Without my help, perhaps the humans back then would have been overwhelmed by the ruthless youkai.
Once regarded as a god, but now referred to as a monster.
